task.name: importaipscaltable
task.shortdescription: Convert a AIPS calibration table (FITS format) to a CASA calibration table
task.description: Convert a AIPS calibration table (FITS format) to a CASA calibration table

param.name: fitsfile
param.description: Name of input AIPS calibration table file (FITS format)

param.name: caltable
param.description: Name of output calibration table file

param.name: extension
param.description: Name of the extension table to use inside the AIPS calibration file

param.name: whichhdu
param.description: Index of the caltable extension to use inside the AIPS calibration file

task.example:
Convert a AIPS calibration table (FITS format) to a CASA calibration table:
Keyword arguments: fitsfile -- Name of input AIPS calibration table file (FITS format) default: none; example='n09m1.tasav.FITS' caltable -- Name of output calibration table file default: none; example='n09m1.tasav.gcal' extension -- Name of the extension table to use inside the AIPS calibration file (without the 'AIPS ') default: 'CL' index -- If there is more than one extension of the same name, use this index to indentify it. default: '' = take the last one; example='3' async -- Run asynchronously default = false; do not run asychronously
